ValidationRule.description: Mandatory to fill Buyer Solicitor if Status is Exchanged or Completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'UK', OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Exchanged') ), ISBLANK( Buyer_Solicitor__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory to fill Buyer Solicitor if Status is Exchanged or Completed.
